summary: Comprehensive testing of REALUM platform completed. Backend: 35/35 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All pages load correctly with excellent cyberpunk UI design. Mobile responsiveness verified. All major features working.
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warning in JobsPage.js: useEffect has missing dependency 'fetchJobs' - minor issue, not affecting functionality
seed_data_creation: POST /api/seed creates jobs, zones, proposals, courses, marketplace items, projects
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features tested and working. Frontend refactoring from monolithic App.js to separate components is complete and functional. Mobile bottom navigation works correctly. Token economy with 2% burn rate is operational.

features_tested.user_registration: PASS - All 5 roles (Creator, Contributor, Evaluator, Partner, Citizen) work with role selection UI
features_tested.user_login: PASS - Authentication working correctly with redirect to dashboard
features_tested.dashboard: PASS - Shows user stats (RLM, XP, Level, Badges), role badge, token economy, platform stats, quick actions
features_tested.jobs_page: PASS - Zone filtering works, job cards display with rewards/XP/duration, Apply buttons functional, Active Jobs section shows applied jobs
features_tested.courses_page: PASS - 5 courses displayed with categories, difficulty levels, rewards, Enroll buttons
features_tested.marketplace_page: PASS - Items displayed with categories, prices, seller info, ratings, Purchase buttons
features_tested.voting_page: PASS - Proposals displayed with vote counts, progress bars, Vote For/Against buttons
features_tested.wallet_page: PASS - Balance displayed, Transfer button, Recent Transactions section
features_tested.leaderboard_page: PASS - User rankings with XP, level, badges, role badges, RLM balance
features_tested.profile_page: PASS - User info, Badge Collection (1/23) with earned/locked badges by rarity
features_tested.metaverse_page: PASS - 2.5D isometric map with 8 zones, job counts, interactive zone selection
features_tested.simulation_page: PASS - Andreea/Vlad/Sorin user cards, 3 simulation steps with Run Step buttons, Reset button
features_tested.mobile_responsiveness: PASS - Dashboard, Jobs, all pages adapt well to mobile viewport, bottom navigation bar works
